-JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHER_SRC := \
-    $(call FindSrcDirsForComponent, jdk.jpackage, applauncher) \
+JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHERLIB_SRC := \

@@ -36,0 +37,13 @@
+ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, linux), true)
+  JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHER_SRC := \
+      $(call FindSrcDirsForComponent, jdk.jpackage, applauncher) \
+      $(call FindSrcDirsForComponent, jdk.jpackage, applauncherlibcommon)
+  JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHER_TOOLCHAIN := TOOLCHAIN_DEFAULT
+else
+  JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHER_SRC := \
+      $(call FindSrcDirsForComponent, jdk.jpackage, applauncher) \
+      $(JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHERLIB_SRC)
+  JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHER_TOOLCHAIN := TOOLCHAIN_LINK_CXX
+endif
+
+

+JPACKAGE_CFLAGS_windows := -DUNICODE -D_UNICODE
+JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHER_INCLUDES := $(addprefix -I, \
+    $(sort $(JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHER_SRC) $(JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHERLIB_SRC)) \
+)

+        $(JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHER_INCLUDES), \

+    CFLAGS_macosx := -Wno-format-nonliteral, \

@@ -65,1 +88,25 @@
-$(BUILD_JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHEREXE): $(call FindLib, java.base, java)
+JPACKAGE_TARGETS += $(BUILD_JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHEREXE)
+
+
+################################################################################
+
+ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, linux), true)
+
+  $(eval $(call SetupJdkLibrary, BUILD_JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHERLIB, \
+      NAME := jpackageapplauncherlib, \
+      OUTPUT_DIR := $(JPACKAGE_OUTPUT_DIR), \
+      SYMBOLS_DIR := $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/native/$(MODULE)/jpackageapplauncherlib, \
+      SRC := $(JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHERLIB_SRC), \
+      TOOLCHAIN := TOOLCHAIN_LINK_CXX, \
+      OPTIMIZATION := LOW, \
+      CXXFLAGS := $(CXXFLAGS_JDKLIB) $(JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHER_INCLUDES), \
+      CFLAGS := $(CFLAGS_JDKLIB) $(JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHER_INCLUDES), \
+      CFLAGS_linux := -Wno-format-nonliteral, \
+      LDFLAGS := $(LDFLAGS_JDKLIB) \
+          -Wl$(COMMA)--version-script=$(TOPDIR)/make/modules/$(MODULE)/applauncherlib.ld-version-script, \
+      LIBS := $(LIBCXX) -ldl, \
+  ))
+
+  JPACKAGE_TARGETS += $(BUILD_JPACKAGE_APPLAUNCHERLIB)
+
+endif
